jade.security

Interface JADEAccessController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JADEAccessControllerImpl

    public interface JADEAccessController
    The JADEAccessController interface represents the way of building a Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) for a component (i.e. a container or an agent) that provides a service. JADEAccessController has methods for checking for the authorization for performing an action according to a given policy.
    Version:
    $Date: 2004-07-13 11:47:37 +0200 (mar, 13 lug 2004) $ $Revision: 394 $
    Author:
    Giosue Vitaglione - Telecom Italia LAB
